headline: Royal Caribbean (RCL): Has the Recent Share Price Cooldown Opened Up a Valuation Opportunity?
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) has quietly shifted from pure travel play to a cash generative heavyweight, and the stock’s recent drift masks how much the business has changed since the industry’s shutdown. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. The share price has cooled off recently, with a 90 day share price return of negative 26.4 percent even as the 3 year total shareholder return of 360.55 percent shows the longer term momentum story is still very much intact. If Royal...
